title: Desgin with Intention
description: The same way bad architecture pollutes the physical world, bad design begins to pollute the internet.

title: Cats and Technology
description: Will cats be the first of our furry friends to master javascript? This author explores new research in the developing feline brain as it pertains to technology.

title: Moonr8ker
description: An app that allows you to plan activities based on the phases of the moon.
